alert.note: Alert for Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 9:18PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River near Thomaston affecting Upson and Talbot Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Lovejoy, Peachtree City, Fayetteville, Americus, Peachtree City, Woolsey, Sharpsburg, Peachtree City, Peachtree City, Senioa, Griffin, Griffin, Orchard Hill, Molena, Thomaston, Carsonville, Montezuma, Byromville... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Flint River near Thomaston. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:46 PM EDT Monday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:46 PM EDT Monday was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.2 feet on 02/18/1992. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
